# Using the default paramaters from the getData function gets the data from all of the pages of pay for computer science majors from payscale.com

```{r}
library(CSPay)
library(here)
getData()
pay_by_school
```
# The parameters can be modified to get data from different majors by changing the url and number of pages to scrape data.
